articles.title: Kim Jong Il Provides Field Guidance to Kujang Fish Farm
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Provides Field Guidance to Kujang Fish Farm
 Pyongyang, August 18 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il, provided field guidance to the Kujang Fish Farm rebuilt on an expansion basis.
					After being briefed on the farm before a map showing its panoramic view, he went round the fish farm whose appearance has undergone a radical change to learn in detail about the reconstruction of the fish farm and fish breeding there.
					
					Kujang County has modernized and scientized fish breeding processes on the basis of the latest science and technology by its own efforts, thus opening up a good prospect for rapidly increasing the production of freshwater fish, he said, adding this is a laudable success. He was pleased to see one more modern fish breeding centre. 
					
					He underscored the need to put fish breeding on a scientific and intensive basis, setting forth important tasks which would serve as guidelines for further developing the nation's fish farming. 
					
					He said that large quantities of freshwater fish are now being produced at the fish farms built by the army and society in recent years, making a great contribution to improving the diet of servicepersons and people. This signal change that has taken place in the era of Songun clearly proves the validity and vitality of the Party's policy on developing fish farming on a large scale, he added.
					
					Noting that the country has very favorable conditions for breeding fish in a big way as it abounds in rivers, lakes, springs and hot springs, he called for energetically doing fish farming in a mass movement to bring about a new turn in this work. 
					
					He underlined the need to find out all right places for fish farming while making a good use of springs and hot springs and thus build more fish farms to make sure that every place where water is available teems with fish.
					
					Noting that it is of particular importance to settle the problem of feed now that a lot of fish farms have been built in different parts of the country, he indicated tasks and ways for doing so.  
					
					He earnestly called on all fields and units to conduct fish breeding in a revolutionary manner to rapidly boost the fish production so that they can translate the lifetime ardent wish of President Kim Il Sung to provide the people with a sufficient amount of fish into a reality as early as possible. 
					
					He was accompanied by Kim Phyong Hae, chief secretary of the North Phyongan Provincial Committee of the WPK, Choe Thae Bok and Kim Ki Nam, secretaries of the C.C., the WPK, and other leading officials of the C.C., the WPK.

articles.title: Anniversary of Establishment of State Quality Control System Observed
articles.content:
Anniversary of Establishment of State Quality Control System Observed
 Pyongyang, August 18 (KCNA) -- A national meeting was held at the People's Palace of Culture Monday to mark the 60th anniversary of the establishment of the state quality control system.
					 Present there were Kim Yong Il and Choe Thae Bok, leading officials of ministries and national institutions, officials concerned and officials in the field of quality control.
					
					The participants heard the recorded speech "On Improving Quality Control" made by President
						Kim Il Sung at a national conference of quality control workers on February 2, Juche 70 (1981).
					
					 Vice-Premier of the Cabinet O Su Yong in a report referred to the fact that the President clarified the essence of the quality control and its popular nature, gave clear answers to the theoretical and practical issues arising in implementing it and wisely led the drive to carry it out.
					
					 General Secretary Kim Jong Il published "Let Us Firmly Arm Ourselves with the Juche-Oriented Theory of Socialist Economic Management" and other works, thereby upholding and defending the President's Juche-based idea and theory of quality control and bringing about a radical change in decisively improving the quality of goods, he said, and went on:
					
					 The socialist quality control system has fulfilled its mission and duty for the past six decades under the seasoned and tested leadership of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il.
					
					 He underscored the need for all fields and units to consider it as an important task to improve quality as required by the developing reality in which a dynamic drive for building an economic power is now underway and energetically push ahead with the above-said work.

articles.title: Solidarity with Korean People Expressed
articles.content:
Solidarity with Korean People Expressed
 Pyongyang, August 18 (KCNA) -- The visiting delegation of the World Peace Council held a meeting for solidarity with the Korean people at the People's Palace of Culture on Monday.
					 Present there was the delegation of the council headed by its President Socorro Gomes.
					
					Attending it were Mun Jae Chol, chairman of the National Peace Committee of Korea and acting chairman of the Korean Committee for Cultural Relations with Foreign Countries, officials concerned and working people in the city of Pyongyang.
					
					Mun Jae Chol said at the meeting that though the separatist forces at home and abroad are maneuvering in every way to push the north-south relations to confrontation, the Korean people remain steadfast in their will to open a new era of independent reunification, peace and prosperity in the idea of "By our nation itself."
					
					The Korean people will surely build a great prosperous and powerful reunified nation in this land, true to the Songun politics of General Secretary Kim Jong Il, he stressed.
					
					Socorro Gomes said that the Korean people defended the sovereignty of the country by displaying their inexhaustible mental power and unrivaled bravery under the wise leadership of President
						Kim Il Sung. This serves as an example for the world people to follow, he added.
					
					 He strongly demanded that the United States abandon its hostile policy towards the DPRK, pull all armed forces out of south Korea and replace the Armistice Agreement with a peace accord.
					
					 Iraklis Tsavdaridis, executive secretary of the council, and Binayak Bhattacharyya, member of the council, denounced the Ulji Freedom Guardian joint military exercises being staged by the U.S. imperialists and their followers, contending that threat to peace and security of the Korean Peninsula comes from the imperialists' aggression moves.
					
					  A solidarity letter to Kim Jong Il from the WPC delegation was read out at the meeting.

articles.title: India's Day of Independence Marked
articles.content:
India's Day of Independence Marked
 Pyongyang, August 18 (KCNA) -- A friendship gathering with staff members of the Indian embassy here took place at DPRK-India Friendship Pyongyang Wasan Middle School on Tuesday on the occasion of the 62nd anniversary of independence of India.
					 Present there on invitation were Charan Jeet Arora, charge d' affaires ad interim, and staff members of the Indian embassy here. 
					
					 On hand were Pak Kyong Il, vice-chairman of the DPRK-India Friendship Association, officials concerned and teachers and students of the school. 
					
					 Being briefed on the fact that the school has achieved great successes in education after being furnished with modern educational equipment and facilities, the guests went round experiment and practice rooms.
					
					 They enjoyed an art performance given by students of the school and talked to one another, deepening the friendship.

articles.title: Independence Day of Indonesia Marked
articles.content:
Independence Day of Indonesia Marked
 Pyongyang, August 18 (KCNA) -- Daulat Hotma Audison Passaribu, Indonesian ambassador to the DPRK, Monday arranged a reception at the Taedonggang Diplomatic Corps Club to mark the 64th independence day of Indonesia.
					 Present there on invitation were Kang Nung Su, minister of Culture, Kung Sok Ung, vice-minister of Foreign Affairs, Jon Yong Jin, vice-chairman of the Korean Committee for Cultural Relations with Foreign Countries, officials concerned and diplomatic envoys of different countries and representatives of international organizations here.
					
					 Staff members of the Indonesian embassy were on hand.
					
					 Speeches were made there.

articles.title: Remains of People Killed during Korean War and Relics Unearthed
articles.content:
Remains of People Killed during Korean War and Relics Unearthed
 Pyongyang, August 18 (KCNA) -- Remains of patriots and other people massacred by the enemies during the Korean war and relics were unearthed in Jangbang-ri, Haeju City of South Hwanghae Province of the DPRK.
					 The U.S. imperialists and class enemies killed more than 260,000 innocent people in the province alone in that period.
					
					 Remains of more than 170 patriots and other people who were mercilessly killed by the class enemies by orders of the U.S. imperialists were unearthed in a pit on a hillside in Jangbang-ri. 
					
					 Also discovered were at least 200 relics of more than 10 kinds including publications at that time, clothes, shoes, buttons and belts as well as ropes, handcuffs, bullets and cartridges, etc.
					
					 These remains and relics and other findings bear witness to the thrice-cursed atrocities committed by the enemies.

articles.title: Love and Trust Bringing about Miracle and Innovation
articles.content:
Love and Trust Bringing about Miracle and Innovation
Pyongyang, August 18 (KCNA) -- Miracles and innovations are being reported from working sites of the 150-day campaign every day.
					This is a display of the firm will of the working class to live up to the deep trust and expectation of General Secretary Kim Jong Il who wants to see that it will become the vanguard in effecting the great upsurge in every working site of the 150-day campaign.
					
					The leader, with a grand plan to shine this year as a year of great revolutionary upsurge to be specially recorded in the history of building a thriving nation, has showed boundless love for and trust in the working class on his continued long journey of patriotic devotion and thus aroused it to the struggle and advance, victory and miracle.
					
					He saw to it that workers in the field of metal industry and related enterprises were invited to the grand evening of fireworks to mark significantly May Day, the international holiday of all the working people in the world, and a grand banquet was arranged in honor of them. He also enjoyed performances of the State Merited Chorus and the revolutionary opera "The Flower Girl" together with them. 
					
					He bestowed benevolent gifts on them when they returned to their working sites.
					
					He told that workers of Jagang Province had not been invited to the May Day events, so he had to go and congratulate them and the great revolutionary upsurge would take place only when Kanggye rose up, before leaving for the faraway northern end.
					
					When he gave field guidance to mines in the Komdok area, he went into underground cutting face thousands of foot deep, saying he should go wherever the workers were.
					
					At the Taegyedo tideland reclamation site in the West Sea, he feasted his eyes on the vast blue fields and spoke highly of the constructors' great successes.
					
					Having a photo session with them, he promised with them to bring the day of victory, showing deep trust in and love for them.
					
					Some time ago he provided field guidance to the Pyongyang Textile Mill where he met with veteran labor heroines and young labor innovators to highly praise their patriotic devotion and warmly inspire them.

articles.title: Korean Nation's Influence on Cultural Development in Japan
articles.content:
Korean Nation's Influence on Cultural Development in Japan
Pyongyang, August 18 (KCNA) -- The Korean nation gave a great influence on the development of culture in Japan in early years.
					Technicians of Koguryo and Paekje disseminated their developed weaving technology and clothes-making method among Japanese people from the end of the 3rd century to the early of the 4th century. In particular, it is told that the Paekje man who was invited to Japan in 283 was the founder of the weaving and clothes-making in Japan.
					
					A cloth of Koguryo silk remains still in the Shouso Hall of the Todai Temple in Nara Prefecture. It was patterned when weaving, which was an application of a highly developed technology at that time.
					
					After reading a poem composed by a Palhae envoy in 815, a renowned Japanese poet said that he could hardly take his hand off the poem and was happy to recite it. Miyakono Yoshika, who boasted of being a good writer in Japan, lavished his praises on Yang Song Gyu, a Palhae envoy, after reading his writings in 872.
					
					Various collections of prose and poetry and individual libraries which remain still in Japan reflect the conceits of Palhae envoys and laudation over them.
					
					During the Imjin Patriotic War against Japan, the invaders kidnapped many Korean ceramists to Japan. Then many feudal lords set up stoves in their areas and forced the ceramists to make various kinds of porcelains. Hundreds of stove sites came into being at that time and later they became hubs of porcelain production in Japan.
					
					In the period of Ri Dynasty Korean messenger parties dispatched to Japan included many talented persons who were versed into calligraphy, painting and other cultural and artistic fields.
					
					Many framed calligraphic works written by excellent literary men of the messenger parties are preserved in various temples in Japan as valuable legacies.
					
					A lot of Korean cultural heritages preserved in museums and temples in Tokyo and other parts of Japan prove the excellent culture of the Korean nation.

articles.title: Japan's Impertinent Bid to Sit on UNSC Flayed
articles.content:
Japan's Impertinent Bid to Sit on UNSC Flayed
 Pyongyang, August 18 (KCNA) -- Foreign Minister of Japan Nakasone was recently reported to have uttered that to obtain permanent membership of the UNSC is "one of the most important diplomatic tasks" of Japan.
					 Minju Joson Tuesday in a signed commentary terms this outburst an impertinent behavior of a "political pigmy" lost to shame and all sense of decency.
					
					 It goes on:
					
					 As far as permanent membership of the UNSC is concerned, it is not something to be readily given to anyone who craves for it. 
					
					 Japan has pursued diplomacy, reading its master the U.S. face without any sense of dignity and the like, not to incur its displeasure.    It is quite logical that Japan is not in a position to hold a responsible post of the UN.
					
					 Japan has a history in which it did too hideous damage to humankind in the 20th century to be pardoned. Japan is the only country that has not yet paid to the international community for this. 
					
					 Japan keen to sit on the UNSC without fulfilling its obligation has become a laughing stock of the people. 
					
					 Japan, politically imbecile and diplomatically immature, eyes such responsible post of the UN. This is as foolish an act as trying to pluck a star from the sky. 
					
					 Japan had better to drop such foolish desire to get promotion, seized with such excessive ambition. 
					
					 Japan is obliged to redeem its past crimes before doing anything.

articles.title: Japanese Reactionaries' Moves for Overseas Expansion Flayed
articles.content:
Japanese Reactionaries' Moves for Overseas Expansion Flayed
Pyongyang, August 18 (KCNA) -- The "Consultative Council for Security and Defense Capability" known to be a "military think tank" representing the militaristic forces in Japan in its report called for a change in the interpretation of the "Constitution" to enable the "Self-Defense Forces (SDF)" to use weapons and the reexamination of the "three principles of arms export." 
					Rodong Sinmun Tuesday observes in a signed commentary in this regard:
					
					Through the reexamination of the principles the Japanese reactionaries seek to drastically revise the principles and tighten the military cooperation with other aggressor forces in a bid to create conditions and environment favorable for overseas military expansion. 
					
					In a word, their moves to reexamine the above-said principles and legalize the SDF's use of weapons are aimed at turning Japan into a military giant and rounding off the preparations for reinvasion. 
					
					What should not be overlooked is the fact that the Japanese reactionaries are pushing forward these moves with main emphasis on coping with a "contingency" on the Korean Peninsula.
					
					It is open secret that they are keen to realize their scenario for staging a comeback to Korea through preemptive attack after singling out the DPRK as the primary target of their overseas aggression. They are set to launch Asian reinvasion with a preemptive attack on the DPRK as a momentum. 
					
					But it is a pipe dream of the Japanese reactionaries to realize their ambition for reinvasion by force of arms. It is as foolish an act as inviting misfortune.
					
					Japan would be well advised to face up to the reality and stop its rash acts.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun on Massive Anti-"Government" Struggle in S. Korea
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun on Massive Anti-"Government" Struggle in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, August 18 (KCNA) -- The massive anti-"government" struggle mounting in south Korea is a patriotic struggle for justice as it is aimed at protecting the independent dignity and rights of the nation, promoting the democratic development of society and achieving the reunification of the country, says Rodong Sinmun Tuesday in a signed article. 
					 It goes on:
					
					 The south Korean conservative ruling forces are bringing back the era of fascist dictatorship to south Korea, escalating the confrontation between the north and the south in total denial of the historic inter-Korean joint declarations. These reckless actions are touching off towering resentment and resistance among different social circles and people of broad strata.
					
					 The massive struggle being waged by public organizations and people from all walks of life in south Korea is an inevitable product of the treacherous rule of the conservative ruling forces.
					
					 The reckless actions of the fascist clique have thrown a stumbling block in the way of the June 15 era of reunification, which made dynamic progress, delayed the achievement of the independent reunification, peace and prosperity, the ardent desires of the Korean nation, and increased the danger of a war on the Korean Peninsula day by day.
					
					 It was none other than the fascist clique that restored all the repressive systems and mechanisms in the period of the former dictatorship and brutally cracked down upon not only the organizations for the reunification movement but the people who called for the elementary right to existence on charges of "resorting to "illegal violence".
					
					 The "regime for confrontation", "regime keen on security" and "dictatorial regime" have become the pronouns of the south Korean authorities.  The popular masses' grudge and resentment at the ruling forces are running high.
					
					 The struggle of the south Korean people to put an end to the dictatorship veiled with the word of "pragmatism" is bound to develop into all-people resistance. The group of traitors may be ousted from the political arena and ostracized socially any time.

articles.title: Implementation of Inter-Korean Declarations Urged
articles.content:
Implementation of Inter-Korean Declarations Urged
 Pyongyang, August 18 (KCNA) -- Kang Ki Gap, representative of the Democratic Labor Party of south Korea, issued a statement on Aug. 14 urging the conservative ruling forces to sincerely implement the June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration.
					 The statement noted that in the recent public opinion polls the absolute majority of the population called for reconciliation and cooperation between the south and the north and the retraction of the present "government's" hostile policy toward the DPRK.
					
					 The Lee Myung Bak "government" should opt for implementing the said declarations without delay, it held.

articles.title: Japan's Scheme for Revival of Militarism Criticized
articles.content:
Japan's Scheme for Revival of Militarism Criticized
 Pyongyang, August 18 (KCNA) -- The Women's Solidarity of south Korea held a meeting in Seoul on Aug. 15 slashing at Japan's scheme for revival of militarism and the bellicose forces' war moves. 
					 Speakers at the meeting condemned Japan for working hard to cover up the crimes it committed against the Korean people in the past and getting evermore undisguised in the moves to revive militarism.
					
					 They also denounced the Lee Myung Bak "government" for persisting in the confrontation with fellow countrymen while totally denying the June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration. If the authorities do not opt for the reconciliation between the south and the north and national reunification, they will face stronger resistance of the people, they warned.
					
					In a resolution the organization strongly demanded that Japan give up its scheme for revival of militarism and make an apology and reparation for the sexual slavery crimes committed by the Japanese imperialists in the past and that the Lee Myung Bak "government" sincerely implement the inter-Korean declarations and drop its policy of confrontation with the DPRK.

articles.title: Actions to Force Conservative Ruling Forces to Step down Called for in S. Korea
articles.content:
Actions to Force Conservative Ruling Forces to Step down Called for in S. Korea
Pyongyang, August 18 (KCNA) -- The Solidarity for Implementing the South-North Joint Declaration in south Korea on August 15 issued a statement titled "Lee Myung Bak, the arch criminal who bedeviled the inter-Korean relations, step down."
					 The statement said:
					
					 The south and the north are now in a state of distrust and confrontation contrary to the desire of the Korean nation and the Lee Myung Bak regime is entirely to blame for this. 
					
					No sooner had Lee come to power than he reduced the June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration to dead papers. He is keen on escalating the tension on the Korean Peninsula, crying out for "a preemptive attack" and the like whenever an opportunity presents itself. 
					
					In order to ensure peace on the Korean Peninsula, develop the inter-Korean relations and achieve the prosperity of the Korean nation, it is necessary to force the Lee Myung Bak regime to step down as early as possible and pressurize the United States to roll back its hostile policy toward the DPRK, a policy bringing a war to this land. 
					
					 The statement called upon all the Koreans to turn out in the struggle against the south Korea-U.S. joint military exercises as an immediate task.

articles.title: Members of Jongyojo Go on Indefinite Hunger Strike
articles.content:
Members of Jongyojo Go on Indefinite Hunger Strike
 Pyongyang, August 18 (KCNA) -- More than 200 chairpersons of branches of the Teachers Union (Jongyojo) from all the parts of south Korea entered an indefinite hunger strike in Seoul on Aug. 14 in protest against the puppet authorities' crackdown upon unionists on charge of their participation in the actions to issue teachers' declaration on the situation. 
					 They held a meeting before the hunger strike.
					
					 The chairman of Jongyojo, addressing  the meeting, accused the present "government" of kicking off "the operation to destroy Jongyojo" as evidenced by the heavy disciplinary measure taken against its 89 leading members under the pretext of the movement for issuing declarations on the situation, etc. declaring that the organization would wage a stubborn struggle against the conservative ruling forces' crackdown.
					
					 He stressed that the organization would launch a large-scale struggle to judge the Lee Myung Bak "government" by calling a hunger strike.
					
					 In another development, more than 20 members of the central executive committee of Jongyojo who had been dismissed by the authorities for participating in the movement for issuing declarations on the situation went on an indefinite hunger strike at Jogye Temple in Seoul.

articles.title: Songun Revolutionary Leadership of Kim Jong Il Praised
articles.content:
ongun Revolutionary Leadership of Kim Jong Il Praised
Pyongyang, August 18 (KCNA) -- A meeting was held in Mexico and a film show in Indonesia on Aug. 8 and 11 to mark the 49th anniversary of General Secretary Kim Jong Il's start of the Songun revolutionary leadership.
					Speeches were made at the functions.
					
					The mayor of Nezauacoyotl City, Mexico, said that they deem it as their honor to join the Korean people in celebrating the above-said anniversary.
					
					He stressed that Kim Jong Il, chairman of the DPRK National Defence Commission, is wisely leading the Korean people's drive to build a great prosperous and powerful nation while smashing the imperialists' scheme to stifle the DPRK with the might of Songun.
					
					Benigno Gonzales Villasana, chairman of the Mexico-Korea Friendship Association, described the start of Kim Jong Il's Songun revolutionary leadership 49 years ago as an event of weighty significance in victoriously developing the Korean revolution. And he expressed belief that the Korean people would surely open the gate to a thriving nation in 2012 marking the centenary of birth of President Kim Il Sung under the Songun leadership of Kim Jong Il.
					
					The deputy director of the Rabitra Bahtera Pratama Co. of Indonesia said: We are convinced that the Korean people under the Songun leadership of Kim Jong Il will certainly win in the confrontation with the U.S.
					
					 The participants in the film show watched Korean film "Reply of Korea".

articles.title: Solidarity with Korean People Expressed
articles.content:
Solidarity with Korean People Expressed
 Pyongyang, August 18 (KCNA) -- The Arab Committee for Solidarity with Korean People and Supporting the Reunification of Korea in Jordan and the Egypt-Korea Friendship Association released a joint statement on Aug. 12 in support of the just cause of the Korean people.
					Noting that such colorful events as seminar on works of President Kim Il Sung and General Secretary Kim Jong Il, film show and photo exhibition were held in the Arab region in the month of international solidarity with the Korean people, the statement said: This showed that the Arab and Korean peoples are struggling in close unity to defend freedom, justice and sovereignty from the imperialist allied forces' moves against mankind.
					
					 The DPRK has strikingly demonstrated the unity and cohesion of the Korean people closely rallied around the leadership with its world-startling indomitable will and mental power and reliably defended the sovereignty and dignity of the country and the nation with its self-reliant defence capability in the face of the imperialist forces' insolent moves, thus giving confidence to the world progressives, the statement said, and went on:
					
					Being firmly convinced that the DPRK will defeat the imperialist forces violating the justice of humankind, we pay our best regards to the DPRK leadership.
					
					 Extending full support and solidarity to the Korean people in the struggle for national reunification, we express our resolution to vigorously struggle together with them to move up the day of downfall of the common enemies.

articles.title: Story about Removed Straw Mat
articles.content:
Story about Removed Straw Mat
Pyongyang, August 18 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il suddenly had his car stopped near a threshing ground of a grain-producing work-team in Taedong County while giving field guidance to South Phyongan Province in November Juche 56 (1967). 
					It was because he found some unhulled rice littered on a straw mat on the road. Farmers had spread it there to dry wet rice and gather in dried rice.
					
					The officials realized why he stopped the car when he said that they should pass by after removing the mat.
					
					He first took an edge of the mat.
					
					The perplexed officials prevented him from taking it. But he said with a generous smile: "Never mind. Let's remove the straw mat together".
					
					While keeping his eyes on the scattered rice on the mat, he said they should not drive over the rice farmers had produced with much effort, and moved the mat to the roadside together with the officials. 
					
					The officials were deeply touched by the noble traits of the leader who valued even a grain of rice very much.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il dirige en el terreno establecimientos industrials
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il dirige en el terreno establecimientos industriales
Pyongyang, 18 de agosto (ATCC) -- El Dirigente Kim Jong Il, Secretario General del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, dirigio sobre el terreno el Complejo Termoelectrico de Pukchang y la Mina de Carbon Juventud de Jikdong 8 de Febrero.
					Le acompanaron el secretario Kim Ki Nam y los jefes de departamento Pak Nam Gi y Jang Song Thaek, del CC del PTC.
					
					 El Dirigente estuvo primero en el Complejo Termoelectrico de Pukchang.
					
					Guiado por los funcionarios directivos del complejo, el Dirigente visito ante todo la sala de presentacion del historial.
					
					Seguidamente, averiguo en detalles el estado de produccion electrica recorriendo varios puntos como la sala de control general de produccion.
					
					Al termino de su revista al exterior y al interior de los establecimientos culturales y de servicios publicos como Centro de Cultura Fisica Taephyong construido originalmente en el recinto de la fabrica, califico de loable el hecho de que los funcionarios de aqui facilitaron a los obreros suficientes condiciones de descanso cultural al construir magnificamente esas facilidades imprescindibles para la vida de los obreros.
					
					El Dirigente presento las tareas que tiene por delante ese complejo destacando que son muy importantes la posicion y el papel de esta empresa, encargada de gran porcentaje de la generacion electrica del pais.
					
					El Dirigente subrayo que la tarea mas importante del complejo es asegurar el pleno funcionamiento mediante el buen mantenimiento de equipos y la eficiente administracion tecnica.
					
					Lo mas importante para normalizar en el alto nivel la produccion de electricidad en este complejo es proveerle a tiempo de suficiente carbon, su combustible principal, destaco.
					
					Para este fin, las minas de carbon relacionadas con el complejo deben garantizar la produccion de este combustible fosil y el sector ferroviario ha de organizar bien su transporte, indico.
					
					A continuacion, el Dirigente estuvo en la Mina de Carbon Juventud de Jikdong 8 de Febrero.
					
					En primer lugar, el visito el monumento en memoria de la visita de orientacion del Presidente
						Kim Il Sung, la lapida con instruccion dada por el Presidente en el terreno y la sala de presentacion del historial.
					
					Luego de escuchar explicaciones ante el plano perspectivo de la mina, paso por la sala de control general de produccion, la de divulgacion de ciencias y tecnicas, las instalaciones para el autoabastecimiento y otros lugares informandose concretamente del estado de modernizacion y produccion de carbon en la mina.
					
					Indico las tareas que se presentan ante la mina diciendo que ella tiene el deber y papel muy importantes.
					
					El Complejo Carbonifero Juventud de la Zona de Sunchon, que abarca esta mina de Jikdong, tiene buenas perspectivas porque cuenta con ricos yacimientos de carbon de buena calidad, apunto. 
					
					Por eso, hay que modernizarlo con vistas al futuro hasta que se convierta en una de las bases claves de produccion carbonifera, concluyo.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il dirige sobre terreno el criadero de peces de Kujang
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il dirige sobre terreno el criadero de peces de Kujang
Pyongyang, 18 de agosto (ATCC) -- El Dirigente Kim Jong Il, Secretario General del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, dirigio sobre el terreno el reconstruido y ampliado Criadero de Peces de Kujang.
					Luego de escuchar la explicacion frente al plano, el Dirigente recorrio el criadero transformado averiguando los detalles de la obra de reconstruccion y la cria de peces.
					
					Se mostro muy satisfecho por la aparicion de otra moderna base de piscicultura destacando que es un exito orgulloso que el distrito de Kujang abriera las buenas perspectivas para aumentar bruscamente la produccion de peces de agua dulce al llevar a cabo basandose en la ciencia y tecnica de punta y con las fuerzas propias la modernizacion y la fundamentacion cientifica de los procesos de cria.
					
					Subrayo que se debe realizar la fundamentacion cientifica y la intensificacion de la cria de peces y presento las tareas programaticas que serviran de guia para desarrollar aun mas la piscicultura del pais.
					
					Muchos pescados, que se producen ahora en los criaderos construidos en los ultimos anos en las unidades militares y las sociales, hacen ya gran aporte al mejoramiento de la vida alimentaria de los militares y los habitantes, menciono.
					
					Anadio que este orgulloso cambio acontecido en la era del Songun (priorizacion militar) comprueba patentemente la justeza y la vitalidad de la politica de nuestro partido de fomentar en gran medida la piscicultura. 
					
					Nuestro pais tiene optimas condiciones para la cria de peces en gran medida porque hay muchos rios, lagos, manantiales y fuentes termales, senalo y agrego que se debe registrar un nuevo viraje en esa labor impulsandola dinamicamente como movimiento masivo.
					
					Al paralelo del uso activo de los manantiales y fuentes termales, debemos construir mas criaderos en todos los terrenos adecuados para que se vean bancos de peces en todas partes con fuentes de agua, asevero.
					
					 Puesto que fueron construidos por doquier muchos criaderos, adquiere especial importancia resolver el problema de cebo, dijo y enseno las tareas y remedios correspondientes.
					
					Encomendo encarecidamente a todos los sectores y todas las unidades que aumentaran bruscamente la produccion de peces al impulsar la cria de modo revolucionario para llevar cuanto antes a la realidad el deseo del Presidente Kim Il Sung quien prestaba mucha atencion en su vida a los trabajos para el suministro de pescados al pueblo en cantidades suficientes.
					
					El Dirigente fue acompanado en esta ocasion por el secretario responsable del Comite del Partido del Trabajo de Corea en la Provincia de Phyong-an del Norte, Kim Phyong Hae, los secretarios del CC del PTC, Choe Thae Bok y Kim Ki Nam, y otros cuadros directivos del CC del PTC.

articles.title: Acto central por aniversario 60 de sistema de supervision de calidad
articles.content:
Acto central por aniversario 60 de sistema de supervision de calidad
Pyongyang, 18 de agosto (ATCC) -- Tuvo lugar el dia 17 en el capitalino Palacio Cultural del Pueblo el acto central por el 60o aniversario del establecimiento del sistema estatal de supervision de la calidad.
					En la ocasion participaron Kim Yong Il, Choe Thae Bok, los funcionarios directivos de los ministerios y los organos centrales y otros del sector de supervision de la calidad.
					
					Los participantes escucharon a traves de la voz grabada el discurso del Presidente Kim Il Sung pronunciado el 2 de febrero del 70 (1981) de la Era Juche en la Conferencia Nacional de Controladores de la Calidad de los Productos "Para mejorar e intensificar el control de la calidad de los productos".
					
					El vicepremier del Consejo de Ministros, O Su Yong, en su informe senalo que el Presidente se refirio a la esencia de la labor de supervision de la calidad y su caracter popular, dio la perfecta respuesta a los problemas teorico-practicos que se presentan en esta labor y condujo sabiamente la lucha por su efecto.
					
					El Dirigente Kim Jong Il publico la obra               "Armemonos firmemente con las teorias jucheanas sobre la administracion economica socialista" y otras en las que defendio la idea y la teoria autoctonas del Presidente en materia de supervision de la calidad e hizo registrarse el cambio radical en la labor para elevar decisivamente la calidad de los productos, subrayo el informante y prosiguio:
					
					Bajo la veterana y probada direccion del Presidente y el Dirigente el sistema de supervision de la calidad socialista cumplio con su mision y deber  a lo largo de los 60 anos pasados.
					
					Conforme a la demanda del desarrollo de la realidad en que se libra una energica lucha por la construccion de la potencia economica en todos sectores y unidades, debemos presentar el problema de elevacion de la calidad de los productos como la tarea importante y promover sin cesar esta labor.

articles.title: Minju Joson condena ambicion atrevida de Japon
articles.content:
Minju Joson condena ambicion atrevida de Japon
Pyongyang, 18 de agosto (ATCC) -- Hace unos dias, el canciller japones, Nakasone, dijo que "una de las tareas diplomaticas mas importantes" de su pais es hacerse miembro permanente del Consejo de Seguridad de la ONU.
					Al publicar este martes un comentario individual, el periodico Minju Joson ironizo que ese discurso de Nakasone es otra conducta atrevida del "enano politico" (Japon) que no tiene cara ni verguenza.
					
					El miembro permanente del Consejo de Seguridad de la ONU no es una posicion que puede ocupar facilmente cualquier aspirante, adelanta el comentarista y prosigue:
					
					Claro esta que Japon no puede asumir ese cargo importante porque practica una diplomacia dependiente y aduladora a su amo (gringo) sin ninguna pizca de dignidad.
					
					Si bien ha causado enormes percances a la humanidad en el siglo pasado, Japon sigue siendo el unico que no los ha liquidado todavia a la vista de la sociedad internacional.
					
					La gente se rie sarcasticamente de la actitud de Japon que esta antojado de dicho cargo alto de la ONU sin hacer lo que le toca hacer.
					
					El miembro permanente del Consejo de Seguridad es un objetivo inalcanzable para ese pais isleno torpe en lo politico e inmaduro en lo diplomatico.
					
					Japon debera liquidar primero su pasado lleno de crimenes antes de sonar con ascender a ese cargo.
